title: Pôle Méca seminar series
text:
This wiki serves as a central hub for all the Pôle Méca seminar series. This series consists of weekly seminars co-organised by all labs from the Pôle Mécanique. Anyone (PhD students, postdocs and permanent faculty memebers) are welcom to present their work!
Here, you will find:

Schedule: The schedule of the internal seminar series.
Past Seminars Archive: The list of past seminars with the associated decks of slides.
Registration page: A page to register as a speaker.
